meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superabundant or excessive.
meanings.sent1: The superableness of food at the party meant everyone went home with leftovers.
meanings.sent2: Her superableness in collecting shoes was evident from the overflowing closet.
meanings.sent3: The superableness of jokes at the comedy show kept the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: His superableness in generosity knew no bounds, always giving more than anyone expected.
meanings.sent5: The superableness of colors in the painting made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: The ability to exceed what is necessary or normal.
meanings.sent1: The superableness of her energy allowed her to finish all her tasks with time to spare.
meanings.sent2: His superableness in solving puzzles made him the champion of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The superableness of toppings on the pizza made it a challenge to eat without making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The superableness of his speed on the track amazed everyone watching.
meanings.sent5: Her superableness in memorizing facts helped her ace the exam effortlessly.
